mapper.select: SELECT * from (SELECT rownum rn ,a.* from (SELECT bc.*, nvl(cnt,0) creply_cnt,u.user_name FROM BOARD_COMM bc, (SELECT CBOARD_NO, count(*) cnt FROM BOARD_COMM_REPLY GROUP BY CBOARD_NO) bcr, users u WHERE bc.CBOARD_NO =bcr.CBOARD_NO(+) AND comm_big=300 AND comm_mid=10 AND bc.user_no = u.user_no order by cboard_date DESC) a) WHERE rn >= #{start} and rn <=#{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT bc.* FROM BOARD_COMM bc WHERE bc.COMM_BIG = 300 AND bc.COMM_MID = 10 AND (CBOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR CBOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_COMM (CBOARD_NO, CBOARD_TITLE, CBOARD_CONTENT, CBOARD_VIEWCNT, CBOARD_DATE, USER_NO, CBOARD_DELETE_CHK, COMM_BIG, COMM_MID, COMM_BIG2, COMM_MID2, COMM_UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_COMM.nextval, #{cboard_title}, #{cboard_content},#{cboard_viewcnt} , sysdate, #{user_no}, 0, 300, 10, NULL, NULL, sysdate)
